_meanings:
{@--1@} To
see, look at, observe, view, behold,
perceive; {#drakzyasi BrAtfjAyAM#} <ls>Me. 10</ls>,
<ls n="Me.">19</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 42.</ls>

{@--3@} To visit, wait or call upon;  
{#pratyudyayO muniM drazwuM brahmARamiva vAsavaH#} <ls>Rām.</ls>

{@--6@} To search, investigate,
examine, decide; <ls>Y. 1. 327</ls>, <ls n="Y.">2. 305.</ls>

{@--7@} To see by divine intuition;  
{#fzirdarSanAtstomAn dadarSa#} <ls>Nir.</ls>

{@--8@} To look
helplessly on (without power to
prevent what is taking place).

{@--1@} To be seen or
perceived, become visible or 
manifested; {#tava taccAru vapurna dfSyate#}  
<ls>Ku. 4. 18</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 4.">3</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 40</ls>; <ls>Bk. 3. 19</ls>; <ls>Me. 112.</ls>

{@--2@} To appear or look like, seem,
look; <ls>R. 3. 34.</ls>

{@--4@} To produce (as in a
court of justice); <ls>Ms. 8. 158.</ls>
To wish or desire to see.
